start.welcome: Hello! I am a bot that will help you read Twitter without leaving Telegram!
start.instructions: Use /add @username to subscribe to a Twitter account, /list to see your subscriptions, and /lang to change language.

add.success: Successfully subscribed to @{username}! You will now receive new tweets from this account.
add.user_not_found: Twitter user @{username} not found. Please check the username and try again.
add.invalid_username: Invalid username format. Please use @username format.
add.error: Failed to add subscription. Please try again later.

remove.error: Failed to remove subscription. Please try again later.

list.title: Your subscriptions:
list.empty: You have no active subscriptions. Use /add @username to subscribe to a Twitter account.
list.error: Failed to load subscriptions. Please try again later.

lang.title: Select your language:
lang.error: Failed to change language. Please try again later.

ai.error: Failed to generate AI response. Please try again later.
ai.unavailable: AI service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

tweet.error: Failed to load tweet. The tweet may be private or deleted.

video.error: Failed to download video. Please try again later.
video.unsupported: Video platform not supported. Supported platforms: TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts.
video.too_large: Video file is too large to send via Telegram.
video.download_error: Failed to download video. Please try again later.
video.file_too_large: Video file is too large to send via Telegram (max 50MB).
video.processing_timeout: Video processing timed out. Please try again with a shorter video.
video.unsupported_url: Video URL not supported. Supported platforms: TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts.
video.caption:
📹 {title}
🎥 From {platform}

inline.no_results: No results found for this tweet URL.
inline.error: Failed to process inline query. Please try again.

link.subscribe_prompt: Would you like to subscribe to @{username}?
link.error: Failed to process link. Please check the URL and try again.

error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
error.api_fail: Twitter API is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
error.rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes.

service.unavailable: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
service.maintenance: Service is under maintenance. Please try again later.

elonmusk.subscribed: ✅ You are now subscribed to Elon Musk's tweets! You will receive new tweets from elonmusk.
elonmusk.unsubscribed: ❌ You have unsubscribed from Elon Musk's tweets. You will no longer receive tweets from elonmusk.
